Konte žestoko po upravi: Kažu mi da se smejem na TV-u, a meni je muka!
“Krupne greške su napravlje u planiranju ove sezone”, jasan je Interov trener

05 Nov 2019

Imao je 1:0 protiv Barselone, pa je izgubio sa 1:2. Imao je i 2:0 protiv Borusije Dortmund, pa je izgubio sa 2:3. Antonio Konte je napravio evidentan napredak u Interu, ali još Nerazuri ne liče na tim iz kategorije onih najboljih. I ako pitate Kontea jasno će vam reći: tim nije dovoljno dubok za borbu za titulu u Seriji A i Ligu šampiona. U stvari, već vam, je rekao. A sada...“Razočaravajuće, šta da kažem? Govore i da mi trebalo više da se smejem na televiziji. Trebalo bi da uvek pričam iste stvari, o procesu rasta, kako treba da idemo korak po korak. Možda da me pitate uvek ista pitanja pa da probam da odgovorim”, počeo je vidno uznemireni Konte.
Nije mu lako zaista. Na poluvremenu je delovalo da gazi do pobeede, a onda…“Ne bih ni komentarisao drugo poluvreme. Previše ima alibi priča i ne želim da stvaram nove. Nadam se samo da će i ova utakmica razjasniti situaciju onima koji treba da razumeju. Momci idu 100 na sat i mogu samo da im zahvalim na svemu što rade. Više od ovoga oni ne mogu. Nervira me sve ovo i nadam se da ovaj porazu nervira i moje igrače. Smučilo mi se više da iznova i iznova ponavljam iste stvari. Nadam se da će direktor doći i reći to umesto mene”, prebacio je Konte lopticu u dvoište Bepea Marote.
Njegov je posao da dovede igrače uostalom. A Konte nije strpljiv čovek koji će da sedi i trpi.“Baš me briga za januar ili februar.  Morali smo ovu sezonu da isplaniramo mnogo, mnogo bolje. Dokazali smo da možemo da namučimo svakoga kad smo u formi, ali ovi igrači igraju non-stop. I smučilo mi se da pričam više o tome. Samo na osnovu drugog poluvremena možete to i sami da zaključite. Nije do kluba, moramo svi da radimo zajedno, velike su greške napravljene”, nastavio je Konte.
Pitanja nije čekao.“Ne možemo da igramo Seriju A i Ligu šampiona i da konstantno guramo igrače do limita. Moram da razgovaram i sa igračima, jer smo protiv Sasuola od 4:1 stigli do 4:3, tako da nije ni samo do toga, ali igrači bar imaju alibi i nema smisla poricati naše trenutno stanje. A mi smo Inter, moramo uvek da pazimo sebe i da shvatimo da smo… U stvari, sad ću opet da izazovem neku kontroverzu. Bolje ne. Zaustavite me sada”, ugrizao se Konte za usta.
Pre no što je završio.“Zaista sam j…o besan. Ne možemo više od ovoga. Udarili smo u plafon”.
(FOTO: Reuters)

Contes Fierce at Management: They tell me to laugh on TV, and I'm sick of it!
"Big mistakes have been made in planning this season," the Inter coach said

05 Nov 2019

He was 1-0 against Barcelona, so he lost 1: 2. He also had 2-0 against Borussia Dortmund, so he lost 2: 3. Antonio Konte has made evident progress at Inter, but Nerazuri still does not resemble the team of the best. And if you ask Konte he will tell you clearly: the team is not deep enough to fight for the Serie A and Champions League titles. In fact, he already told you. And now ... ”Disappointing, what can I say? They also say that I needed to laugh more on television. I should always say the same things, about the growth process, how we should go step by step. Maybe you always ask me the same questions and try to answer, ”began the visibly upset Konte.
It's not easy for him really. At half-time it seemed to go all the way to victory, and then… ”I wouldn't even comment on the second half. There are too many alibi stories and I don't want to create new ones. I just hope that this game will also clarify the situation for those who need to understand. The guys go 100 per hour and I can only thank them for everything they do. More than this, they can't. I am annoyed by all this and I hope this defeat annoys my players as well. I was tired of repeating the same things over and over. I hope the director will come and say it for me, ”he shuffled the Conte ball into Bepe Marota's court.
His job is to bring players in after all. And Conte is not a patient man to sit and suffer. ”I don't care about January or February. We had to plan much, much better this season. We have proven that we can torment everyone when in shape, but these players play non-stop. And I was tired of talking about it. Only on the basis of the second half can you conclude this yourself. It's not up to the club, we all have to work together, big mistakes have been made, "Konte continued.
He couldn't wait for questions. "We can't play Serie A and the Champions League and constantly push players to the limit. I have to talk to the players too, because we got to 4: 1 against Sasuol, so it's not just that, but the players at least have an alibi and there is no point in denying our current state. And we are Inter, we must always be careful of ourselves and realize that we are… In fact, now I will cause some controversy again. Better not. Stop me now, ”snapped his mouth.
Before he was finished. "I'm really just ... angry. We can't go beyond this. We hit the ceiling. "
(PHOTO: Reuters)
